summary: REQ-12 appears implemented: `typingWords` in `frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx` includes exactly 5 entries in the required order and the hero headline still renders "Full-Stack" followed by `<TypingWord />`. Two additional non-requested project metadata/summary files were also modified.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified project metadata/summary files not requested by the BuildRequest.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks to update the `typingWords` constant in `frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx`; it does not request changes to repository summary/state files.
